text: Jiří Novák and David Rikl were the defending champions but lost in the quarterfinals to Tomás Carbonell and Nicolás Lapentti. Roger Federer and Marat Safin won the final 0-1 after Michael Hill and Jeff Tarango were forced to retire. ==Seeds== Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated. # Jiří Novák / David Rikl (Quarterfinals) # Petr Pála / Pavel Vízner (Quarterfinals) # Michael Hill / Jeff Tarango (Final) # Pablo Albano / Lucas Arnold (First Round) ==Draw== ==External links== * 2001 UBS Open Doubles Draw Category:Swiss Open (tennis) Category:2001 ATP Tour
title: 2001 UBS Open – Doubles
